title: Eclipses of the sun and moon
creator_credit: William Kay and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Illustrates solar and lunar eclipses, and explains the effect of the position of the earth’s and moon’s orbital planes on the frequency of eclipses. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
description: Illustrates solar and lunar eclipses, and explains the effect of the position of the earth’s and moon’s orbital planes on the frequency of eclipses. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
